title: Micro Gate
descript: A command-line interface (CLI) to interact with CU service engine.
The light interface increases free memory, processing speed and improves the unit performance.
Agvantages of micro gate make it suitable to use on micro computers of an IoT system.
MS-Gate provides an environment in which a particular precedure of micro service is called.
Micro service can be a configured public MS or a private MS.
Micro service can be used on cessor network or on a private network.
Micro service gate is suitable to develop IoT micro secrvices.
